00027 SIP_Agent::SIP_Agent(std::string localaddr) : mutex(0), wait(0) {
00028 
00029     registered = false;
00030     connectionEstablished = false;
00031     sleepTime = 1.0;
00032 
00033     std::cout << "Creating socket...";
00034     sock = socket( AF_INET, SOCK_DGRAM, 0);
00035 
00036     if (sock == -1)
00037         throw std::runtime_error("Can't create UDP socket!");
00038 
00039     std::cout << "OK, assigned socket number is " << sock << std::endl;
00040 
00041     std::cout << "Binding to address...";
00042     address.sin_family = AF_INET;
00043     address.sin_addr.s_addr = inet_addr(localaddr.c_str());  // INADDR_ANY;
00044     address.sin_port = 0;
00045 
00046     if (bind(sock, (sockaddr *) &address, sizeof(address)) == -1)
00047         throw std::runtime_error("Can't bind to address!");
00048 
00049     std::cout << "OK, address: ";
00050 
00051     int length = sizeof( address );
00052     if (getsockname( sock, (sockaddr *) &address, (socklen_t *) &length) == -1)
00053         throw std::runtime_error("Can't get assigned address!");
00054 
00055     std::cout << inet_ntoa( address.sin_addr ) << ":" << ntohs( address.sin_port ) << std::endl;
00056 
00057     killThread = false;
00058     pthread_create(&thread, NULL, SIP_AgentThread, (void *) this );
00059     mutex.V();
00060 
00061 }

00063 SIP_Agent::~SIP_Agent() {
00064 
00065     mutex.P();
00066     killThread = true;
00067     mutex.V();
00068 
00069     pthread_join( thread, (void **)NULL );
00070 
00071     std::cout << "Closing socket...";
00072     if (close(sock) != 0)
00073         throw std::runtime_error("Can't close socket!");
00074     std::cout << "OK" << std::endl;
00075 }

00077 std::string SIP_Agent::generateCallID() {
00078     std::string callid = "";
00079 
00080     for (int i = 0; i < 10; ++i)
00081         callid += toString( rand() % 10 );
00082 
00083     return callid + "@" + proxy;
00084 }
00085 
00086 void SIP_Agent::generateFromTag() {
00087     tag = "";
00088 
00089     for (int i = 0; i < 10; ++i) {
00090         int v = rand() % 16;
00091         if (v < 10)
00092             tag += toString( v );
00093         else
00094             tag += toString( (char) (((int) 'a') + (v - 10)) );
00095     }
00096 
00097 }

00099 std::string SIP_Agent::generateBranch() {
00100     std::string result = "";
00101     for (int i = 0; i < 20; ++i)
00102         result += toString( rand() % 10 );
00103     return result;
00104 }

00106 std::string SIP_Agent::addressString() {
00107     return std::string(inet_ntoa( address.sin_addr )) + ":" + toString(ntohs( address.sin_port ));
00108 }

00110 void SIP_Agent::sendMessage(SIP_Message &m, std::string address, unsigned short port) {
00111     std::string s = m.toStream();
00112 
00113     sockaddr_in r;
00114 
00115     r.sin_family = AF_INET;
00116     r.sin_addr.s_addr = inet_addr(address.c_str());
00117     r.sin_port = htons( port );
00118 
00119     sendto(sock, s.c_str(), s.length(), 0, (sockaddr *) &r, sizeof( r ));
00120 
00121     /*  std::cout << "-----   SIP Message sent   -----" << std::endl;
00122         std::cout << m;
00123         std::cout << "--------------------------------" << std::endl;*/
00124     std::cout << "SIP: >> " << m.rline << std::endl;
00125 }

00127 void SIP_Agent::replyToOptions(SIP_Message &m) {
00128 
00129     SIP_Message reply;
00130 
00131     reply.rline = "SIP/2.0 200 OK";
00132     reply.via.push_back(m.via[0]);
00133 
00134     reply.lines.push_back("Max-Forwards: 70");
00135 
00136     reply.lines.push_back("Contact: <sip:" + user + "@" + addressString() + ">");
00137 
00138     reply.lines.push_back("From: " +  m.getField("From"));
00139     reply.lines.push_back("To: " + m.getField("To"));
00140 
00141     reply.lines.push_back("Call-ID: " + m.getField("Call-ID"));
00142     reply.lines.push_back("CSeq: " + m.getField("CSeq"));
00143 
00144     reply.lines.push_back("Accept: application/sdp");
00145     reply.lines.push_back("Accept-Language: en");
00146 
00147     reply.lines.push_back("Allow: INVITE, ACK, OPTIONS, BYE");
00148 
00149     reply.lines.push_back("Content-Length: 0");
00150 
00151     sendMessage(reply, proxy, proxyPort);
00152 
00153 }

00157     SIP_Message reply;

00160     reply.via.push_back(m.via[0]);
00161 
00162     reply.lines.push_back("Max-Forwards: 70");
00163 
00164     reply.lines.push_back("Contact: <sip:" + user + "@" + addressString() + ">");
00165 
00166     reply.lines.push_back("From: " +  m.getField("From"));
00167     reply.lines.push_back("To: " + m.getField("To"));
00168 
00169     reply.lines.push_back("Call-ID: " + m.getCallID());
00170     reply.lines.push_back("CSeq: 1 ACK");
00171 
00172     reply.lines.push_back("Content-Length: 0");
00173 
00174     sendMessage(reply, proxy, proxyPort);

00178 void SIP_Agent::replyRinging(SIP_Message &m) {
00179 
00180     SIP_Message reply;
00181 
00182     reply.rline = "SIP/2.0 180 Ringing";
00183     reply.via = m.via;
00184 
00185     reply.lines.push_back("Contact: <sip:" + user + "@" + addressString() + ">");
00186 
00187     reply.lines.push_back("From: " +  m.getField("From"));
00188     reply.lines.push_back("To: " + m.getField("To") + ";tag=" + tag);
00189 
00190     reply.lines.push_back("Call-ID: " + m.getCallID());
00191     reply.lines.push_back("CSeq: " + m.getField("CSeq"));
00192 
00193     reply.lines.push_back("Content-Length: 0");
00194 
00195     sendMessage(reply, proxy, proxyPort);
00196

00199 void SIP_Agent::answerCall(SIP_Message &m) {
00200 
00201     SIP_Message reply;
00202 
00203     reply.rline = "SIP/2.0 200 OK";
00204     reply.via = m.via;
00205 
00206     reply.lines.push_back("Contact: <sip:" + user + "@" + addressString() + ">");
00207 
00208     reply.lines.push_back("From: " +  m.getField("From"));
00209     reply.lines.push_back("To: " + m.getField("To") + ";tag=" + tag);
00210 
00211     invite.callid = m.getCallID();
00212     invite.cseq = atoi( m.getField("CSeq").c_str() );
00213     partnerID = m.getField("From");
00214     int pb = partnerID.find("sip:") + 4;
00215     int pe = partnerID.find("@", pb);
00216     partnerID = partnerID.substr(pb, pe - pb);
00217 
00218     reply.lines.push_back("Call-ID: " + m.getCallID());
00219     reply.lines.push_back("CSeq: " + m.getField("CSeq"));
00220 
00221     reply.lines.push_back("Record-Route: " + m.getField("Record-Route"));
00222 
00223     reply.lines.push_back("Allow: INVITE, ACK, OPTIONS, BYE");
00224 
00225     reply.lines.push_back("Content-Type: application/sdp");
00226 
00227     reply.body = "v=0\n";
00228     reply.body += std::string("o=- 9 2 IN IP4 ") + inet_ntoa( address.sin_addr ) + std::string("\n");
00229     reply.body += "s=X-Lite\n";
00230 //    reply.body += "s=CounterPath X-Lite 3.0\n";
00231     reply.body += std::string("c=IN IP4 ") + inet_ntoa( address.sin_addr ) + std::string("\n");
00232     reply.body += std::string("t=0 0\n");
00233     reply.body += std::string("m=audio ") + toString(localRtpPort) + std::string(" RTP/AVP 0 8 3 98 97 101 107\n");
00234 //    reply.body += std::string("m=audio ") + toString(localRtpPort) + std::string(" RTP/AVP 107 101\n");
00235     reply.body += std::string("a=alt:1 1 : JelDk9w1 QTsOTJSj ") + inet_ntoa( address.sin_addr ) + " " + toString(localRtpPort) + "\n";
00236     reply.body += "a=rtpmap:0 pcmu/8000\n";
00237     reply.body += "a=rtpmap:8 pcma/8000\n";
00238     reply.body += "a=rtpmap:3 gsm/8000\n";
00239     reply.body += "a=rtpmap:98 iLBC/8000\n";
00240     reply.body += "a=rtpmap:97 speex/8000\n";
00241     reply.body += "a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000\n";
00242     reply.body += "a=rtpmap:107 BV32/16000\n";
00243     reply.body += "a=fmtp:101 0-15\n";
00244     reply.body += "a=sendrecv\n";
00245 
00246     reply.lines.push_back("Content-Length: " + toString(reply.body.length()));
00247 
00248     sendMessage(reply, proxy, proxyPort);
00249 
00250 }

00252 void SIP_Agent::receiveMessage() {
00253 
00254     sockaddr_in sender;
00255     unsigned int senderlength;
00256 
00257     char buf[32768];
00258 
00259     if (0 >= recvfrom(sock, buf, 10, MSG_PEEK | MSG_DONTWAIT, NULL, NULL))
00260         return;
00261 
00262     int buflength = recvfrom(sock, buf, 32768, 0, (sockaddr *) &sender, &senderlength);
00263 
00264     SIP_Message m( buf, buflength );
00265 
00266     /*  std::cout << "----- SIP Message received -----" << std::endl;
00267         std::cout << m;
00268         std::cout << "------------ Action ------------" << std::endl;*/
00269 
00270     std::cout << "SIP: << " << m.rline << std::endl;
00271 
00272     if (m.isReply()) {
00273         //std::cout << "It's a reply to request " + m.getField("CSeq") + " sent by ";
00274 
00275         if (m.getField("From") == fromtoline) {
00276             //std::cout << "this agent." << std::endl;
00277             int code = m.replyCode();
00278             //std::cout << "Result code is " << code << ", ";
00279             if (code < 100)
00280                 std::cout << "SIP: Error" << std::endl;
00281             else if (code == 200) {
00282 
00283                 if (m.getCallID() == invite.callid) {
00284                     if (waitingfor == CALL) {
00285 
00286                         //std::cout << "that's great, connection established!" << std::endl ;
00287 
00288                         std::cout << "SIP: Connection established." << std::endl;
00289                         std::cout << "SIP: Remote RTP address: " << m.getSdpAddress() << ":" << m.getSdpPort() << std::endl;
00290 
00291                         remoteRtpPort = atoi( m.getSdpPort().c_str() );
00292                         remoteRtpAddress = m.getSdpAddress();
00293                         connectionEstablished = true;
00294 
00295                         partnerTag = m.getField("To");
00296                         partnerTag = partnerTag.substr(partnerTag.find("tag=") + 4 );
00297 
00298                         replyAck(m);
00299 
00300                         waitingfor = NONE;
00301                         wait.V();
00302                     }
00303 
00304 
00305                 } else if (m.getCallID() == registration.callid) {
00306                                         if (unregistering)
00307                                                 std::cout << "SIP: Unregistered." << std::endl;
00308                                         else
00309                                                 std::cout << "SIP: Registered." << std::endl;
00310 
00311                     if (waitingfor == REGISTER) {
00312                         registered = true;
00313                         waitingfor = NONE;
00314                         wait.V();
00315                     }
00316                 }
00317 
00318             } else if (code < 300) {
00319 
00320             } else if (code < 400) {
00321 
00322             } else if (code == 401) {
00323                 // std::cout << "the server wants authentication." << std::endl;
00324                 SIP_Authentication auth = m.getAuthentication();
00325                 if (auth.algorithm != "MD5") {
00326                     std::cout << "SIP: Authentication with " << auth.algorithm << " is not implemented, I give up." << std::endl;
00327                     // std::cout << "No action" << std::endl;
00328                     registered = false;
00329                     waitingfor = NONE;
00330                     wait.V();
00331                 } else {
00332                     std::cout << "SIP: Register again using authentication." << std::endl;
00333                     auth.user = user;
00334                     auth.pass = pass;
00335                     auth.method = "REGISTER";
00336                     auth.uri = "sip:" + proxy;
00337                     registration.authentication = auth;
00338                     Register();
00339                 }
00340 
00341             } else if (code == 403) {
00342 
00343                 if (waitingfor == REGISTER) {
00344                     std::cout << "SIP: Can't register, wrong password?" << std::endl;
00345                     registered = false;
00346                     waitingfor = NONE;
00347                     wait.V();
00348                 }
00349 
00350             } else if (code == 404) {
00351 
00352                 if (waitingfor == CALL) {
00353                     std::cout << "SIP: Can't connect, user not found." << std::endl;
00354                     waitingfor = NONE;
00355                     wait.V();
00356                 }
00357 
00358             } else if (code == 407) {
00359 
00360                 //std::cout << "SIP: Proxy authentication is required." << std::endl;
00361                 replyAck(m);
00362 
00363                 SIP_Authentication auth = m.getProxyAuthentication();
00364                 if (auth.algorithm != "MD5") {
00365                     std::cout << "SIP: Authentication with " << auth.algorithm << " is not implemented, I give up." << std::endl;
00366                     waitingfor = NONE;
00367                     wait.V();
00368                 } else {
00369                     std::cout << "SIP: Invite again using authentication." << std::endl;
00370                     auth.user = user;
00371                     auth.pass = pass;
00372                     auth.method = "INVITE";
00373                     auth.uri = "sip:" + partnerID + "@" + proxy;
00374                     registration.authentication = auth;
00375                     Call();
00376                 }
00377 
00378             } else if (code == 480) {
00379 
00380                 //std::cout << "SIP: Temporary unavailable, busy? rejected?" << std::endl;
00381                 if (waitingfor == CALL) {
00382                     std::cout << "SIP: Temporary unavailable, busy? rejected?" << std::endl;
00383                     waitingfor = NONE;
00384                     wait.V();
00385                 }
00386 
00387             }
00388         } else {
00389             //  std::cout << m.getField("From") << "." << std::endl;
00390             //std::cout << "No action." << std::endl;
00391         }
00392 
00393     } else {
00394         //std::cout << "It's a request - ";
00395         //std::cout << m.getField("From") << " requests " << m.method() << " from " << m.getField("To") << std::endl;
00396 
00397         if (m.method() == "OPTIONS")
00398             replyToOptions(m);
00399         else if (m.method() == "INVITE") {
00400 
00401             std::cout << "SIP: Incoming call. " << std::endl;
00402             replyRinging(m);
00403 
00404             if (waitingfor == ANSWER) {
00405                 remoteRtpPort = atoi( m.getSdpPort().c_str() );
00406                 remoteRtpAddress = m.getSdpAddress();
00407                 answerCall(m);
00408             }
00409         } else if (m.method() == "BYE") {
00410 
00411             if (connectionEstablished && (invite.callid == m.getCallID())) {
00412                 std::cout << "SIP: Disconnecting." << std::endl;
00413                 connectionEstablished = false;
00414             }
00415 
00416         } else if (m.method() == "ACK") {
00417 
00418             if (waitingfor == ANSWER) {
00419                 if (invite.callid == m.getCallID()) {
00420                     std::cout << "SIP: Connection established" << std::endl;
00421                     partnerTag = m.getField("From");
00422                     partnerTag = partnerTag.substr(partnerTag.find("tag=") + 4 );
00423                     connectionEstablished = true;
00424                     waitingfor = NONE;
00425                     wait.V();
00426                 }
00427             }
00428 
00429         }
00430     }
00431 
00432     //std::cout << "--------------------------------" << std::endl;
00433 
00434 }

00437 void SIP_Agent::Register() {
00438     SIP_Message m;
00439     m.rline = "REGISTER sip:" + proxy + " SIP/2.0";
00440     m.via.push_back("Via: SIP/2.0/UDP " + addressString() + ";branch=" + branch);
00441 
00442     m.lines.push_back("Max-Forwards: 70");
00443 
00444     m.lines.push_back("Contact: <sip:" + user + "@" + addressString() + ">");
00445 
00446     fromtoline = "\"" + user + "\"<sip:" + user + "@" + proxy + ">;tag=" + tag;
00447 
00448     m.lines.push_back("From: " + fromtoline);
00449     m.lines.push_back("To: \"" + user + "\"<sip:" + user + "@" + proxy + ">");
00450 
00451     m.lines.push_back("Call-ID: " + registration.callid);
00452     m.lines.push_back("CSeq: " + toString(++registration.cseq) + " REGISTER");
00453 
00454         if (unregistering)
00455                 m.lines.push_back("Expires: 0");
00456         else 
00457                 m.lines.push_back("Expires: 3600");
00458 
00459     if (registration.authentication.algorithm == "MD5") {
00460         m.lines.push_back("Proxy-Authorization: Digest username=\"" + registration.authentication.user +
00461                           "\",realm=\"" + registration.authentication.realm + "\",nonce=\"" + registration.authentication.nonce +
00462                           "\",uri=\"" + registration.authentication.uri + "\",response=\"" + registration.authentication.getMD5() +
00463                           "\",algorithm=MD5");
00464     }
00465 
00466     m.lines.push_back("Content-Length: 0");
00467 
00468     sendMessage(m, proxy, proxyPort);
00469 }

00471 void SIP_Agent::Call() {
00472 
00473     SIP_Message m;
00474 
00475     m.rline = "INVITE sip:" + partnerID + "@" + proxy + " SIP/2.0";
00476     m.via.push_back("Via: SIP/2.0/UDP " + addressString() + ";branch=" + branch);
00477 
00478     m.lines.push_back("Max-Forwards: 70");
00479 
00480     m.lines.push_back("Contact: <sip:" + user + "@" + addressString() + ">");
00481 
00482     m.lines.push_back("From: " + fromtoline);
00483     m.lines.push_back("To: \"" + partnerID + "\"<sip:" + partnerID + "@" + proxy + ">");
00484 
00485     m.lines.push_back("Call-ID: " + invite.callid);
00486     m.lines.push_back("CSeq: " + toString(invite.cseq) + " INVITE");
00487 
00488     m.lines.push_back("Allow: INVITE, ACK, OPTIONS, BYE");
00489 
00490     if (registration.authentication.algorithm == "MD5") {
00491         m.lines.push_back("Authorization: Digest username=\"" + registration.authentication.user +
00492                           "\",realm=\"" + registration.authentication.realm + "\",nonce=\"" + registration.authentication.nonce +
00493                           "\",uri=\"" + registration.authentication.uri + "\",response=\"" + registration.authentication.getMD5() +
00494                           "\",algorithm=MD5");
00495     }
00496 
00497     m.lines.push_back("Content-Type: application/sdp");
00498 
00499     m.body = "v=0\n";
00500     m.body += std::string("o=- 9 2 IN IP4 ") + inet_ntoa( address.sin_addr ) + std::string("\n");
00501     m.body += "s=X-Lite\n";
00502     m.body += std::string("c=IN IP4 ") + inet_ntoa( address.sin_addr ) + std::string("\n");
00503     m.body += std::string("t=0 0\n");
00504     m.body += std::string("m=audio ") + toString(localRtpPort) + std::string(" RTP/AVP 0 8 3 98 97 101 107\n");
00505 //    m.body += std::string("m=audio ") + toString(localRtpPort) + std::string(" RTP/AVP 107 101\n");
00506     m.body += std::string("a=alt:1 1 : JelDk9w1 QTsOTJSj ") + inet_ntoa( address.sin_addr ) + " " + toString(localRtpPort) + "\n";
00507     m.body += "a=rtpmap:0 pcmu/8000\n";
00508     m.body += "a=rtpmap:8 pcma/8000\n";
00509     m.body += "a=rtpmap:3 gsm/8000\n";
00510     m.body += "a=rtpmap:98 iLBC/8000\n";
00511     m.body += "a=rtpmap:97 speex/8000\n";

00522 
00523 CallInfo SIP_Agent::Call(std::string id, unsigned short port) {
00524 
00525     CallInfo result;
00526 
00527     if (!connected()) {
00528         mutex.P();
00529 
00530         std::cout << "SIP: Calling " << id << std::endl;
00531 
00532         remoteRtpAddress = "0.0.0.0";
00533         remoteRtpPort = 0;
00534 
00535         partnerID = id;
00536         localRtpPort = port;
00537 
00538         invite.cseq = 1;
00539         invite.callid = generateCallID();
00540         invite.authentication.algorithm = "";
00541 
00542         waitTime = 0;
00543         waitingfor = CALL;
00544 
00545         Call();
00546 
00547         mutex.V();
00548 
00549         wait.P();
00550     }
00551 
00552     mutex.P();
00553 
00554     result.remoteIP   = remoteRtpAddress;
00555     result.remotePort = remoteRtpPort;
00556     result.callID     = id;
00557 
00558     mutex.V();
00559 
00560     return result;
00561 }
00562 
00563 CallInfo SIP_Agent::Answer(unsigned short port) {
00564 
00565     CallInfo result;
00566 
00567     if (!connected()) {
00568         mutex.P();
00569 
00570         std::cout << "SIP: Waiting for call." << std::endl;
00571 
00572         remoteRtpAddress = "0.0.0.0";
00573         remoteRtpPort = 0;
00574 
00575         localRtpPort = port;
00576 
00577         waitTime = 0;
00578         waitingfor = ANSWER;
00579 
00580         mutex.V();
00581 
00582         wait.P();
00583     }
00584 
00585     mutex.P();
00586 
00587     result.remoteIP   = remoteRtpAddress;
00588     result.remotePort = remoteRtpPort;
00589     result.callID     = partnerID;
00590 
00591     mutex.V();
00592 
00593     return result;
00594 }
00595 
00596 void SIP_Agent::Disconnect() {
00597 
00598     if (!connected())
00599         return;
00600 
00601     mutex.P();
00602 
00603     SIP_Message m;
00604 
00605     std::cout << "SIP: Disconnecting." << std::endl;
00606 
00607     m.rline = "BYE sip:" + user + "@" + addressString() + " SIP/2.0";
00608     m.via.push_back("Via: SIP/2.0/UDP " + addressString() + ";branch=" + branch);
00609 
00610     m.lines.push_back("Max-Forwards: 70");
00611 
00612     m.lines.push_back("Contact: <sip:" + user + "@" + addressString() + ">");
00613 
00614     m.lines.push_back("From: " + fromtoline);
00615     m.lines.push_back("To: \"" + partnerID + "\"<sip:" + partnerID + "@" + proxy + ">;tag=" + partnerTag);
00616 
00617     m.lines.push_back("Call-ID: " + invite.callid);
00618     m.lines.push_back("CSeq: " + toString(++invite.cseq) + " BYE");
00619 
00620     m.lines.push_back("Content-Length: 0");
00621     sendMessage(m, proxy, proxyPort);
00622 
00623     mutex.V();
00624 }
00625 
00626 void SIP_Agent::Unregister() {
00627 
00628         mutex.P();
00629         
00630         if (!registered) {
00631                 mutex.V();
00632                 return;
00633         }
00634 
00635         unregistering = true;
00636         registered = false;
00637         waitingfor = REGISTER;
00638         waitTime = 0;
00639 
00640         Register();
00641 
00642         mutex.V();
00643 
00644         wait.P();
00645 
00646 }
00647 
00648 bool SIP_Agent::Register(std::string user, std::string pass, std::string proxy, unsigned short proxyPort) {
00649 
00650     bool result;
00651 
00652     mutex.P();
00653 
00654     if (registered) {
00655         mutex.V();
00656         return true;
00657     }
00658 
00659         unregistering = false;
00660 
00661     std::cout << "SIP: Registering." << std::endl;
00662 
00663     this->proxyPort = proxyPort;
00664 
00665     connectionEstablished = false;
00666     this->user  = user;
00667     this->pass  = pass;
00668     this->proxy = proxy;
00669 
00670     generateFromTag();
00671 
00672     registration.authentication.algorithm = "";
00673     registration.cseq = 0;
00674     registration.callid = generateCallID();
00675     branch = generateBranch();
00676 
00677     waitTime = 0;
00678     waitingfor = REGISTER;
00679 
00680     Register();
00681 
00682     mutex.V();
00683 
00684     wait.P();
00685 
00686     mutex.P();
00687     result = registered;
00688     mutex.V();
00689 
00690     return result;
00691 }
00692 
00693 bool SIP_Agent::connected() {
00694 
00695     bool result;
00696 
00697     mutex.P();
00698 
00699     result = connectionEstablished;
00700 
00701     mutex.V();
00702 
00703     return result;
00704 }
00705 
00706 void * SIP_AgentThread( void * sip_agent ) {
00707 
00708     SIP_Agent * agent = (SIP_Agent *) sip_agent;
00709 
00710     std::cout << "SIP: Agent thread started." << std::endl;
00711 
00712     agent->mutex.P();
00713 
00714     double sleepTime = agent->sleepTime;
00715 
00716     agent->mutex.V();
00717 
00718     while (1) {
00719 
00720         sleep(sleepTime);
00721         agent->mutex.P();
00722 
00723         agent->receiveMessage();
00724 
00725         if (agent->killThread)
00726             break;
00727 
00728         if (agent->waitingfor != NONE) {
00729             ++agent->waitTime;
00730             double waitSeconds = ((double) agent->waitTime) * sleepTime;
00731             bool timeout;
00732 
00733             switch (agent->waitingfor) {
00734             case CALL:
00735                 timeout = (waitSeconds >= 30.0);
00736                 break;
00737             case ANSWER:
00738                 timeout = (waitSeconds >= 120.0);
00739                 break;
00740             case REGISTER:
00741                 timeout = (waitSeconds >= 10.0);
00742                 break;
00743             default:
00744                 timeout = false;
00745             }
00746 
00747             if (timeout) {
00748                 std::cout << "SIP: Timeout." << std::endl;
00749                 agent->waitingfor = NONE;
00750                 agent->wait.V();
00751             }
00752 
00753         }
00754 
00755         agent->mutex.V();
00756     }
00757 
00758     agent->mutex.V();
00759 
00760     return NULL;
00761 
00762 }
